name: Project Pryde
description:
You're a little square who has the ability to become INTANGIBLE.

Run, jump and pass through the walls and challenges this 2D Platformer has to offer.

This is just a prototype, so there's nothing but the core mechanic and 2 levels to test it.

I will REALLY appreciate your feedback so I can improve the prototype and hopefully turn it into a full game. Would you change something in the movement? the levels? Leave me your comment c:

Thanks! ^^

PS: When you finish the 2 levels you return to the first one. If you want to close the game (In the downloadable version) just press Esc.
